description.zh-cn: 位于东南亚中南半岛东端的社会主义国家，实行一党制，越南共产党为唯一合法政党。1976年越南南北统一后成立。
description.en: A socialist state located at the eastern edge of the Indochinese Peninsula in Southeast Asia, operating as a one-party state led by the Communist Party of Vietnam. Established in 1976 after the reunification of North and South Vietnam.

description.zh-cn: 越南唯一的执政党，对越南行政、立法、司法各部门直接掌控。
description.en: The sole ruling party of Vietnam, directly controlling the executive, legislative, and judicial branches.

description.zh-cn: 越南政治家，现任越南共产党中央委员会总书记兼中央军事委员会书记。
description.en: A Vietnamese politician, currently serving as the General Secretary of the Communist Party of Vietnam and Secretary of the Central Military Commission.

description.zh-cn: 越南政治家，现任越南社会主义共和国主席。
description.en: A Vietnamese politician, currently serving as the President of the Socialist Republic of Vietnam.

description.zh-cn: 越南政治家，现任越南政府总理。
description.en: A Vietnamese politician, currently serving as the Prime Minister of Vietnam.

description.zh-cn: 越南政治家，现任越南国会主席。
description.en: A Vietnamese politician, currently serving as the Chairman of the National Assembly of Vietnam.

description.zh-cn: 越南政治家，现任越共中央书记处常务书记。
description.en: A Vietnamese politician, currently serving as the Standing Member of the Secretariat of the Communist Party of Vietnam.

nodes.id: 越南共产党中央委员会总书记

zh-cn: 越南共产党中央委员会总书记
en: General Secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of Vietnam

description.zh-cn: 越南共产党的最高领导人职务。
description.en: The highest position within the Communist Party of Vietnam.

nodes.id: 越南共产党中央军事委员会

zh-cn: 越南共产党中央军事委员会
en: Central Military Commission of the Communist Party of Vietnam

description.zh-cn: 越南共产党的最高军事决策机构。
description.en: The highest military decision-making body of the Communist Party of Vietnam.

nodes.id: 越南社会主义共和国主席

zh-cn: 越南社会主义共和国主席
en: President of the Socialist Republic of Vietnam

description.zh-cn: 越南社会主义共和国的国家元首。
description.en: The head of state of the Socialist Republic of Vietnam.

description.zh-cn: 越南社会主义共和国的政府首脑。
description.en: The head of government of the Socialist Republic of Vietnam.

en: Chairman of the National Assembly of Vietnam

description.zh-cn: 越南国会的领导人。
description.en: The leader of the National Assembly of Vietnam.

nodes.id: 越南共产党中央书记处

zh-cn: 越南共产党中央书记处
en: Secretariat of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of Vietnam

description.zh-cn: 越南共产党的日常事务处理机构。
description.en: The body responsible for the day-to-day affairs of the Communist Party of Vietnam.

description.zh-cn: 1945年至1976年间存在的社会主义国家，通常被称为北越。
description.en: A socialist state that existed from 1945 to 1976, commonly known as North Vietnam.

description.zh-cn: 1955年至1975年间存在的国家，通常被称为南越，在越南战争中与北越对峙。
description.en: A state that existed from 1955 to 1975, commonly known as South Vietnam, which opposed North Vietnam during the Vietnam War.

description.zh-cn: 北越及其盟友与南越及其盟友（主要是美国）之间发生的战争。
description.en: A war fought between North Vietnam and its allies against South Vietnam and its allies, primarily the United States.

description.zh-cn: 欧洲国家，曾在19世纪至20世纪中期殖民统治越南。
description.en: A European country that colonized Vietnam from the 19th to the mid-20th century.

description.zh-cn: 北美国家，在越南战争中支持南越。
description.en: A North American country that supported South Vietnam during the Vietnam War.

description.zh-cn: 亚洲国家，越南的北方邻国。曾支持北越，后与统一后的越南发生过边境战争。
description.en: An Asian country and Vietnam's northern neighbor. It supported North Vietnam and later fought a border war with the reunified Vietnam.

description.zh-cn: 前社会主义国家，在越南战争期间和战后支持越南。
description.en: A former socialist state that supported Vietnam during and after the Vietnam War.

description.zh-cn: 越南革命家、政治家，越南独立同盟会的创办者和越南民主共和国的缔造者。
description.en: A Vietnamese revolutionary and politician, founder of the Việt Minh and the Democratic Republic of Vietnam.

description.zh-cn: 由胡志明等人于1941年创办的越南独立运动组织，旨在反对法国和日本的殖民统治。
description.en: A Vietnamese independence movement organization founded in 1941 by Ho Chi Minh and others to oppose French and Japanese colonial rule.

description.zh-cn: 1945年8月由越盟发动的起义，旨在夺取越南政权，宣布独立。
description.en: An uprising launched by the Việt Minh in August 1945 to seize power and declare Vietnam's independence.

description.zh-cn: 越盟与法国之间为争夺越南控制权而进行的战争。
description.en: A war fought between the Việt Minh and France for control of Vietnam.

description.zh-cn: 第一次印度支那战争中的决定性战役，越盟在此战中大败法军，导致法国势力撤出越南。
description.en: The decisive battle of the First Indochina War, where the Việt Minh defeated the French forces, leading to the withdrawal of French influence from Vietnam.

description.zh-cn: 旨在解决朝鲜半岛和印度支那问题的国际会议，会议决定以北纬17度线为界暂时分割越南。
description.en: An international conference to resolve issues in the Korean Peninsula and Indochina, which resulted in the temporary partition of Vietnam at the 17th parallel north.

description.zh-cn: 越南共产党于1986年开始推行的经济改革政策，旨在建立“社会主义市场经济”。
description.en: An economic reform policy initiated by the Communist Party of Vietnam in 1986, aimed at creating a "socialist-oriented market economy".

description.zh-cn: 1979年中华人民共和国与越南社会主义共和国之间爆发的边境战争。
description.en: A border war fought in 1979 between the People's Republic of China and the Socialist Republic of Vietnam.

description.zh-cn: 法国在东南亚的殖民地联邦，包括现今的越南、柬埔寨和老挝。
description.en: A colonial federation of France in Southeast Asia, which included modern-day Vietnam, Cambodia, and Laos.

description.zh-cn: 日本在19世纪末至20世纪中期的国家形式，曾在二战期间占领越南。
description.en: The state form of Japan from the late 19th century to the mid-20th century, which occupied Vietnam during World War II.

description.zh-cn: 北越军队攻陷南越首都西贡的事件，标志着越南战争的结束和越南的统一。
description.en: The event where North Vietnamese forces captured Saigon, the capital of South Vietnam, marking the end of the Vietnam War and the reunification of Vietnam.

description.zh-cn: 一个由主权国家组成的国际组织，致力于促进国际合作，维护国际和平与安全。
description.en: An international organization composed of sovereign states, dedicated to promoting international cooperation and maintaining international peace and security.

description.zh-cn: 东南亚地区国家组成的政治和经济联盟。
description.en: A political and economic union of states in Southeast Asia.

description.zh-cn: 负责监督成员经济体之间执行各项贸易协定的国际组织。
description.en: An intergovernmental organization that regulates and facilitates international trade between nations.

description.zh-cn: 越南共产党是越南社会主义共和国的唯一执政党。
description.en: The Communist Party of Vietnam is the sole ruling party of the Socialist Republic of Vietnam.

relationships.target: 越南共产党中央委员会总书记

position.en: General Secretary of the CPV Central Committee

description.zh-cn: 苏林担任越南共产党中央委员会总书记。
description.en: Tô Lâm serves as the General Secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of Vietnam.

relationships.target: 越南共产党中央军事委员会

position.en: Secretary of the Central Military Commission

description.zh-cn: 苏林兼任越南共产党中央军事委员会书记。
description.en: Tô Lâm concurrently serves as the Secretary of the Central Military Commission of the Communist Party of Vietnam.

relationships.target: 越南社会主义共和国主席

description.zh-cn: 梁强担任越南社会主义共和国主席。
description.en: Lương Cường serves as the President of the Socialist Republic of Vietnam.

description.zh-cn: 范明正担任越南政府总理。
description.en: Phạm Minh Chính serves as the Prime Minister of Vietnam.

description.zh-cn: 陈青敏担任越南国会主席。
description.en: Trần Thanh Mẫn serves as the Chairman of the National Assembly of Vietnam.

relationships.target: 越南共产党中央书记处

description.zh-cn: 陈锦秀担任越共中央书记处常务书记。
description.en: Trần Cẩm Tú serves as the Standing Member of the Secretariat of the Communist Party of Vietnam.

description.zh-cn: 19世纪中后期，法国逐步征服越南，建立法属印度支那殖民体系。
description.en: In the mid-to-late 19th century, France gradually conquered Vietnam and established the colonial system of French Indochina.

description.zh-cn: 1941年，胡志明等越南革命家创办“越南独立同盟会”（简称越盟）。
description.en: In 1941, Ho Chi Minh and other Vietnamese revolutionaries founded the "League for the Independence of Vietnam" (Việt Minh).

description.zh-cn: 1945年8月，越南独立同盟会发动八月革命宣布独立。
description.en: In August 1945, the Việt Minh launched the August Revolution to declare independence.

description.zh-cn: 八月革命后，胡志明于1945年9月2日宣告越南民主共和国成立。
description.en: After the August Revolution, Ho Chi Minh declared the establishment of the Democratic Republic of Vietnam on September 2, 1945.

description.zh-cn: 1954年奠边府战役获胜后，法国势力退出越南。
description.en: After the victory in the Battle of Dien Bien Phu in 1954, French forces withdrew from Vietnam.

description.zh-cn: 1954年日内瓦会议规定以北纬17度线划分南北，北方成立越南民主共和国（北越）。
description.en: The 1954 Geneva Conference stipulated the division of Vietnam along the 17th parallel north, leading to the formation of the Democratic Republic of Vietnam (North Vietnam).

description.zh-cn: 1954年日内瓦会议规定以北纬17度线划分南北，为南方越南共和国的成立创造了条件。
description.en: The 1954 Geneva Conference stipulated the division of Vietnam along the 17th parallel north, creating the conditions for the establishment of the Republic of Vietnam in the south.

description.zh-cn: 在越南战争期间，北越（越南民主共和国）与南越（越南共和国）处于敌对状态。
description.en: During the Vietnam War, North Vietnam (Democratic Republic of Vietnam) and South Vietnam (Republic of Vietnam) were in a state of hostility.

description.zh-cn: 在越南战争期间，美国为南越提供支持。
description.en: The United States supported South Vietnam during the Vietnam War.

description.zh-cn: 自1950年起，越盟（及后来的北越）得到苏联的军事、经济援助。
description.en: From 1950 onwards, the Việt Minh (and later North Vietnam) received military and economic aid from the Soviet Union.

description.zh-cn: 1950年1月，中华人民共和国成为第一个承认越南民主共和国并与之建交的国家。
description.en: In January 1950, the People's Republic of China became the first country to recognize and establish diplomatic relations with the Democratic Republic of Vietnam.

description.zh-cn: 1975年4月30日，北越军队攻陷南越首都西贡，越南共和国灭亡。
description.en: On April 30, 1975, North Vietnamese forces captured Saigon, the capital of South Vietnam, leading to the collapse of the Republic of Vietnam.

description.zh-cn: 西贡陷落导致越南统一，并于次年成立越南社会主义共和国。
description.en: The Fall of Saigon led to the reunification of Vietnam and the establishment of the Socialist Republic of Vietnam the following year.

description.zh-cn: 1986年，越南共产党推行革新开放政策，逐步转向社会主义市场经济。
description.en: In 1986, the Communist Party of Vietnam implemented the Đổi Mới policy, gradually shifting towards a socialist-oriented market economy.

description.zh-cn: 因越南入侵柬埔寨及边境争端，中越两国于1979年爆发战争，此后边境冲突持续近十年。
description.en: Due to Vietnam's invasion of Cambodia and border disputes, China and Vietnam went to war in 1979, with border conflicts continuing for nearly a decade.

description.zh-cn: 中越战争由中国人民解放军发动，攻入越南北部省份。
description.en: The Sino-Vietnamese War was initiated by the Chinese People's Liberation Army, which invaded Vietnam's northern provinces.

description.zh-cn: 越南于1977年9月20日加入联合国。
description.en: Vietnam joined the United Nations on September 20, 1977.

description.zh-cn: 越南于1995年加入东南亚国家联盟。
description.en: Vietnam joined the Association of Southeast Asian Nations in 1995.

description.zh-cn: 越南于2007年正式加入世界贸易组织。
description.en: Vietnam officially joined the World Trade Organization in 2007.

description.zh-cn: 1940年9月，大日本帝国出兵占领法属印度支那北部，并于1945年3月全面推翻法国统治。
description.en: In September 1940, the Empire of Japan sent troops to occupy northern French Indochina, and in March 1945, it completely overthrew French rule.
